verbs.description: Trump 's administration [V: could] have 30,000 illegal immigrant children in its care by August as prominent voices on both sides of the aisle push the president to halt the family separations .

[ARG0: Trump 's administration] [ARGM-MOD: could] [V: have] [ARG1: 30,000 illegal immigrant children] [ARGM-LOC: in its care] [ARGM-TMP: by August] [ARGM-ADV: as prominent voices on both sides of the aisle push the president to halt the family separations] .

Trump 's administration could have 30,000 illegal immigrant children in its care by August as [ARG0: prominent voices on both sides of the aisle] [V: push] [ARG1: the president] [ARG2: to halt the family separations] .

Trump 's administration could have 30,000 illegal immigrant children in its care by August as prominent voices on both sides of the aisle push [ARG0: the president] to [V: halt] [ARG1: the family separations] .
